title: Tokyo: Stocks open lower as US-China trade war weighs
text:
Tokyo stocks opened lower on Tuesday in cautious trade amid lingering worries over the US-China trade war, as Beijing said it had lodged a complaint against Washington with the World Trade Organization.

[TOKYO] Tokyo stocks opened lower on Tuesday in cautious trade amid lingering worries over the US-China trade war, as Beijing said it had lodged a complaint against Washington with the World Trade Organization.

The benchmark Nikkei 225 index was down 0.16 per cent or 33.23 points at 20,586.96 in early trade, while the broader Topix index was down 0.14 per cent or 2.09 points at 1,503.12.

AFP
